metadata.name: NAKAMA (friend) - 1 / 3
metadata.description:
“He was beautiful. Gentle. Unlike any other dragon I had encountered throughout the years of my arduous life. Unconditionally, he embraced the wreck I thought of myself to be; I knew he wasn’t someone to be feared…”

Part 1 / 3 of the “AIKA (愛歌) Love Song” Short Story Collection by Talitha King Art

Format: 4960 × 6360 px

The first collector of this NFT will additionally receive the option for the physical fine art print of this piece.
